# activationConditions

**Instance Property**

The conditions that define when UIKit activates the scene object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var activationConditions: UISceneActivationConditions { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to tell UIKIt when you want it to activate this scene.

## Specifying the scene’s activation conditions

- **UISceneActivationConditions**: The set of conditions that define when UIKit activates the current scene.
